name: run_shell_command
description: This tool executes a given shell command as `powershell.exe -NoProfile -Command <command>`. Command can start background processes using PowerShell constructs such as `Start-Process -NoNewWindow` or `Start-Job`.

dir_path.description: (OPTIONAL) The path of the directory to run the command in. If not provided, the project root directory is used. Must be a directory within the workspace and must already exist.
